summary:
USB-C, or USB Type-C, is a new kind of USB connector. It's special because it can replace all the old USB shapes (Type-A and Type-B). This means it can connect to many devices, like computers, phones, and even monitors. It's reversible, so you don't have to worry about which way to plug it in.

USB-C can carry lots of data, like videos and music, and it can also charge your devices quickly. It's like an all-in-one super connector, making it easier to connect things without needing different cables.
title: USB-C
